website_summaries.verdict: Has a feature set comparable to more costly models for an attractive price.
pros: A reliable model for toddlers and young children that will accommodate up to 65 pounds
Has an easy-to-adjust harness, and comes at a mid-range price
cons: Height of shoulder straps is not easily adjustable

customer_reviews.title: 3 across in a small sedan...success
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge decision for me. I am a pediatric icu doctor and see mva victims regularly. I was needing to buy three convertible car seats...one for a mini van, one for an 2003 Camry and one for our nannys Altima. I spoke with several car seat experts and stressed greatly. I got a Britax Boulevard for our van but needed something to go three across with a graco booster and an incognito booster. I ended up Getting two of these. My 1 year old likes this. There is room and yet he is safe. I sometimes wish I bought 3 of these Easy install....great price and happy baby.
customer_reviews.author: NHenderson

customer_reviews.title: New design is unacceptably difficult to release.
customer_reviews.text: This new version of the Contender 65 really made it difficult to release the main restraint adjustment strap. If the seat is in rear facing setup I can barely get my hand into a position to release the belt. I've got an older version that was much easier to adjust. Not impressed with this new design. My MIL can't use this seat when she watches my kids because of this new configuration. Need 2 more seats like this but won't buy another Contender 65.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid!
customer_reviews.text: It is really a well made car seat, padding are nice and firm and very solid. Now you will have to get a insert for your infant. In my case, My boy was 7.7 and roughly 19" when he was born so he looks like a midget in this seat when we first brought him home. hahahha
customer_reviews.author: Allan Lo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great car seat! I was looking around at every style/brand of car seat trying to find one that would fit in a smaller car & landed on this one. The price is unbeatable, right in my budget as a single mom of two. I can't say much about leg room as my little is only 6 months old but he was getting too heavy for me with his carrier & this was a great fit. I have this along with a booster in my backseat & there's still plenty of room in the middle of them.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMama

customer_reviews.title: Safe, reliable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: We receive this a couple of days ago and although we have only used it twice so far I'm very impressed. With our old car seat my 5 month old son would cry every time we placed him in it, with the Graco he's so much more comfortable and strapping him in is no longer an ordeal! I chose this carseat after alot of research as I wanted something safe and reliable that didn't cost a fortune. It looks nice, it isn't too heavy, it's relatively easy to get in and out of our car (Kia soul) and has plenty of growing room. Over all even after only a couple of days I'm so far very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Crotch buckle is too short, can pinch.
customer_reviews.text: Still using it a couple yrs later. It has been durable and affordable. The crotch buckle is really short and my son complains about getting pinched in his thighs unless I'm very careful. I have a crossover SUV and it's hard to get him in because the seat is so tall. I'm probably going to move to a booster soon just because it's so much work to get him in and out of the car that I don't want to take him anywhere! He's 5, so it's okay if I do, but geeze.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Install isn’t easy.
customer_reviews.text: As a mom it’s important that we are able to properly install our kids seats so they are safe. I’ve used Britax seats for years and figured I’d get this seat as an extra for my other vehicle. It’s a decent looking seat and fairly light. But the install SUCKS! I am not a weak woman however I could not get this seat tight enough so it’s safe. I’m returning it and spending the extra money for a better seat that installs in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nearly impossible to install and then remove from car
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift (my son's baby.) He retturned to me citing the great difficulty attaching to car and then trying to remove it. The item is defective or poorly designed. I requested a Return?refund and am awaiting the Company's response. I can't recommend this item. It's possible that ours was just a one-off, but, can't trust this brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond J. (Skip) O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road. Bit frustrated.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product in use for just over a year now. The fabric has held up well (my little eats in the car as well). Cupholder is a must have. My biggest complaint is the straps and the mechanism to tighten them. Every couple of months the mechanism jams for an unknown reason and to pull the straps snug to child I'm full on wrestling the seat. My husband is ready to buy a new seat. Ughh. I have nephews all with differing carseat brands and really feel this one falls in the middle. It's not the worst and it's not the best. It's done it's job and held up but could preform much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It grows with them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to see if we like it. Bought two more because it easy to install. Doesn’t take up as much room as some of the other convertibles do. The buttons are a lot easier to use as we. Most car seats you have to overlap the buckle to get it in and it can be a real struggle. This one you don’t have to do that. Big bonus if you ask me. My six year old that gets mistaken for a 8 year old all the time because she is so tall fits in and is now asking if we can buy her one cause it’s so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile as your child grows, but questionable on safety
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my newborn. Hospital hated it because you cannot carry your baby in it. Mounts somewhat awkwardly in rear seat and requires a lot of room. Only two fastener points in the front, and no matter how tight you make them, the car seat will easily tilt left or right. Worries me if we are every in a side collision wreck. That being said, son is comfortable in it and seat belt has excellent adjustments and holds him well as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: nicely made. Rear facing 5-35lbs and forward 30-65lb. Does NOT convert to booster so will be needed separately. 1 cup holder build in so it’s sturdy. Not as easy to install with anchor b/c they are the cheaper metal ones instead on the easy click anchors. Takes up a little more room in the back than my slim fit in my car. But for my husband it works for the limited time he drives her and the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Estlock

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our grandson but has been used almost exclusively in my car since my son does not yet have a car. It has been installed and removed more than a dozen times with no issues whatsoever. Installation is straightforward and easy and the seat sits fully secure. My grandson, who is only 1, is not a fan of being secured (because he doesn't do much traveling on a regular basis) but is usually asleep in just a few minutes. I'm guessing that means it's comfortable, too!
customer_reviews.author: Morninglori

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: As a grandma, I was looking for an easy to use car seat that was adjustable for the various grandkids. This is perfect and so easy to install! Plus because the back adjusts up or down with ease, it is comfortable for toddler/kids of varying height. The fabric is comfy but also easy to clean and I also love that it isn't bright pink or lime green ... LOL. Simple and strong - just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat!!! It’s the second one we’ve purchased because it’s nice and compact, easy to buckle & seems really comfortable for the kids. After purchasing a different car seat, we opted to purchase another one of these just because it seemed so superior to the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have an inexpensive evenflo tribute seat I bought for $55. We decided to put that seat in my husbands car and get a little bit of a nicer seat for my car as it is our primary family vehicle. This looked nice and did not have a crazy price tag. Pros: love the adjustable harness, like the side impact support, fits rear facing in my sub compact car. Cons: not very padded at all, cheap feeling. Surprisingly my cheaper car seat feels more comfortable. Do yourself a favor, go to target and examine car seats in person.
customer_reviews.author: NEWENGLAND

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the easiest car seat I have ever installed ! The rear facing latch straps are easy to unhook and rehook in your car. It's extremely easy to switch from forward to rear facing , you just have to flip the bottom hinge to the front . One handed reclining !! And the straps adjust with the headrest so I never ever have to fight with those dang things again thank goodness ! Amazing car seat , gorgeous color , nice fabric , very soft and comfy , big cup holder too ! I love it , if I ever decide to have another child this is the only car seat I will purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Hylton

customer_reviews.title: Stopped baby from crying
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car seat. We had evenflo before and even though i loved it as its compact and i can take it in and out of vehicle, she always cried. She hated it. I tried so many accessories to make it work but i just finally broke down and got her graco contender. Its awesome. Baby doesnt cry, easy install, very comfortable for my baby and straps doesnt get tangled like the other car seat. Most importantly, my baby's head is supported when she falls asleep as I drive a lot and on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Beachbummama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need it for. I have a more expensive Safety First carseat for my son in my grammas car that I love. I just bought my own car so I needed a second car seat. But I didn't have a lot of money. This car seat is great especially for the price. Fits great in my car. Easy to install. (Probably not easy to release tho). My son fits in it great. It's just as good as the expensive one I have.
customer_reviews.author: kayla p.

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat, great price. We have been using Graco since LO was born and have been happy with all their products. This seat came highly recommended and it did not disappoint. Fortunately, I have not had to see how it holds up in a crash, and God-willing I never will. Consumer reports has given it excellent marks which gives me confidence that it is safe. We recently took our 1-year-old on a long car trip (10 hours driving time) and he did not seem uncomfortable. In fact, he slept soundly for most of the time we spent in the car. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Adam

customer_reviews.title: This car seat saved my daughters life!
customer_reviews.text: I was in a car accident today. Someone t-boned me on the drivers side. My daughter was sitting in this carseat (installed exactly how the directions list in the rearfacing position) right behind me. She was not even jostled. Not a scratch on her. Although I will still replace the seat (recommendation of the fire department for any seat that has gone through a crash) the seat did not even move. I am very happy with this purchase and do believe that this car seat is just the same as a high end one would be without a doubt a safe bet.
customer_reviews.author: Chile

customer_reviews.title: also the button you push to release the straps across her chest is small and not nearly as easy to use as the car seat my daughter uses ...
customer_reviews.text: The car seat is ok. However, the belt that comes up between my granddaughters legs is so short that I have to reach way under her every time I buckle her in. It's very difficult to use.. also the button you push to release the straps across her chest is small and not nearly as easy to use as the car seat my daughter uses for her. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kristan

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: We used this from when our son was 1 up until after his 3rd birthday. He's very tall for his age and it was getting harder and harder to get him in and out of the seat. He was complaining about wanting to be able to sit upright too as this always kinda has a slightly reclined position. Overall we really liked it and would recommend. We bought a Chicco Next Fit for his new one and put this one in our other car just in case.
customer_reviews.author: M. King

customer_reviews.title: Parent friendly
customer_reviews.text: Holy parent friendly! Simple and quick to install in any type of vehicle (we have had it in rentals including tiny cars, SUVs, minivans, and it's great in my husbands truck/my sedan). When your child grows the headrest adjusts up and down with one hand, without having to rethread the straps! Smooth buckle and strap release. We have used this since our son was rear facing and he has enjoyed both rear and forward facing in this seat. The cup holder is easy to clean. All the cloth parts come off easily to toss in the washer. This is such a fantastic car seat at a low price. You are not sacrificing quality, we truly love this model!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR A YARIS iA
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION TOYOTA YARIS IA OWNERS...this car seat will not fit in the back seat rear facing without forcing the front seats ALL the way forward. It is a great car seat we use it in our Honda Pilot for our grandkids...it works well because we can easily adjust the height of the back and straps. But we bought another for my husbands new Yaris IA and it will not fit...tried every way...with it in I can barley get into the front seat...Keep looking for a smaller seat...if one exists!
customer_reviews.author: Tattooed grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great Carseat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carseat, I have actually bought 2 of them. I drive a 2012 explorer and I can actually fit 3 seats in one row using this carseat. I fit it next to a Graco highback, and an infant Graco snug ride with no base. Its tricky when you have 4 kids in carseats. But I highly recommend. The only thing I don't like is that when I clean it the crotch buckle does not come out. ``
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Evans

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for this price point.
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. The adjustable head rest/protection pulls the straps with it, no more manually rethreading! The material looks sharp, is very comfortable, and doesnt have the old line of toxic flame retardants still used today in many other carseats. I installed this in a captains chair of my minivan. I found that putting the captain seat back while installing, allowed me to really tighten it so the seat has no wiggle room, staying in place in the event of a collusion. While that may be the cause, it doesnt have much foot room for extended rearfacing, but my 18 month old fits fine for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Exley

customer_reviews.title: I second guessed a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was bulky and wouldn't be a good fit for my car. Then I ordere9d a different one and immediately I realized that by moving it to the passenger side the total difference in quality and safety was par none. I pick up my granddaughter once a week from daycare and am always sure she is not only totally safe but also absolutely comfortable. I returned the second one without a problem as the difference in quality was totally visible. I totally recommend this car seat without the slightest doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Elsy

customer_reviews.title: Graco Contender
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought this car seat for a second car, however, after installing, it went into our main car. We also have the graco extend to fit and though both not easy to install, the contender was a little easier and the straps are more adjustable. Our one year old seems to like this one more as well! We would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Fornelli

customer_reviews.title: Simple, safe, excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Good car seat for a great price! Installation is easy although I have one suggestion to look for on other models. We bought this for my husband’s Land Rover. His seat belts don’t stay locked back; they only lock when the car’s brakes are applied hard. After putting in the car seat, I had to order a seat belt strap lock (small metal buckle-$6/pair) to keep the car seat from moving around in the seat. Otherwise, we have no issues with this car seat yet.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D

customer_reviews.title: so good. The straps tighten quite easily
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The straps tighten quite easily, which is a nice change from our old car seat. The seat was easy to install and the instructions were easy to follow to insure proper installation. My daughter seems comfortable in the seat, and it fits well in our car (it's narrower and lighter than our old one). My only complaint is the "button" you push to release the straps is covered by a piece of fabric that is sewn down, so it is difficult and awkward to try to reach. I wish it was closer to the front, or the fabric wasn't sewn down.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bode

customer_reviews.title: Not much leg room but adjustable headrest is great!
customer_reviews.text: Using this car seat, rear facing, does not leave much room. It is difficult to get the the latch to loosen the straps. Also my 1 year old does not have much room for his legs (he is only in the 20th percentile for height)! It is very big but I like the adjustable head rest.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: We use only a couple of times when granddaughter comes to town. It was a pain to install in our older car as the seatbelts were tucked away and difficult to connect. Will be trying soon in new car which seems to have a better setup. As for legroom, again it’s the old cars fault. Hoping for better results in the new car.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Harness issues.
customer_reviews.text: Good construction, sturdy. The only downside is in order for the harness to be tight enough on my daughters chest the bottom harness cuts into the inside of her legs and the buckle puts a lot of pressure on her tummy. I've read the direction several times, tried adjusting many different times and way but still same result.
customer_reviews.author: TheDADreview

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit comfortably in SUV
customer_reviews.text: The seat is very comfy looking, but it does not fit in my SUV well. I have the seat rear facing behind the drivers seat since I have other children that have to be on the passenger side for carpool, but I've had to move my drivers seat up so that it will fit. I've gotten used to driving it like this, but it isn't 100% comfortable for me. She'll be forward facing in a few months so I can deal until then but I didn't have this issue with my last car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Yo

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We love this carseat and I always recommend it! First off you cannot beat the quality for price that Graco offers. This carseat is easy to install, easy to clean, and will fit a child for a long time. My son is 5 and just grew out of it. If you need a seat that will last from newborn until they are ready for a booster, this is the seat for you.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the baby safe
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat overall my daughter fits nicely in it. It does adjust for proper head placement. Has all the normal installation points to mount in the car. Only complaint is the release button for the harness is a bit tricky to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Love almost everything about this car seat. The adjusting of the straps is super super easy and I love the little drink holder and that it is sturdy. The installation is a bit annoying, but I haven’t ever come across and easy installing car seat! One thing I don’t like is that I can’t take the fabric off to wash it. There must be a way to do it, but it sure isn’t intuitive!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Initially I liked the seat, it fits very well in our 5 passenger car and the straps are very easy to adjust. The installation was very rough because the hooks do not tighten well, but using the seat belt is satisfactory. The problem I'm facing now is the durability of the fabric. I washed it one time (after my daughter threw up) and when I went to out it back on the seat there was an obvious rip on the head rest that I will need to sew up. For the price it's very nice, but I'm not confident that it will last up to 60lbs for us.
customer_reviews.author: angel wright

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and seems to be very comfortable. My almost 2 years old loves her new car seat!
customer_reviews.author: The Millas

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat, great price.
customer_reviews.text: We got this to put in our truck, in case the car with his regular car seat in it is not here. Although I don't think this is nearly as safe as his Britax (it doesn't have the anti-rebound bar) it is very easy to use and very comfortable and roomy for him. He's a big (over 20 lbs) baby, so I don't think this would be good for a very small baby.
customer_reviews.author: J Foster

customer_reviews.title: Not buy this sit
customer_reviews.text: The box comes open first thing strong. I gate about the inclinación its to much for my 18mo who loves to be almost seats. I so dissapointed about this sitio. I wanna cry really upset me that I dont like and I I dont want it.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work front facing
customer_reviews.text: this is great so long as you don't need to install it front facing. the straps simply aren't long enough to reach the latches in my car, which have to be pretty standard. It was a great seat until then, however.
customer_reviews.author: cpseattle

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite graco seat I’ve had and I’ve had many
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is okay. Not my favorite graco seat I’ve had and I’ve had many. Straps fit a little too wide on the shoulders, especially on a smaller child. I always have to adjust them to make sure my child’s shoulders are secure. The straps are also difficult to retighten when the child is in the seat. The price point is good though, which makes up for those issues a bit. The quality is much better than a similar price point seat I tried before this.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Tim

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to install(both forward and rear facing) and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old. It is easy to install(both forward and rear facing) and easy to clean. While rear facing, it doesn't leave much room for the front seat passenger. You have to keep the front seat pushed forward just to fit it, but I am short, so I put it behind the driver seat since I have the seat forward anyway. The cup holder is nice to have. Good quality. Easy to adjust the head part. When my other son gets old enough to go forward facing, I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: cydney williams

customer_reviews.title: Overall great purchase, just a couple critiques
customer_reviews.text: Great carseat, the only thing I dont like is the straps will twist in their buckle part and it is difficult to untwist them with a toddler in the seat who is screaming! The straps also love to fall in the carseat and you have to dig them out as you put your child in as their is no hooks on the side to hold the straps out. Even with the full length of the straps pulled out, they do not like to hang over the sides to easily put your child in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have one for my car and one for my parents. I have only been using it for about a month though so I haven't had time to hate it. It is the easiest car seat to adjust. No rethreading. Just pull the headrest up and the strap. It is a little heavy but I am a wimp. It is a little snug in my Toyota Yaris rear facing and I had to pull my seat up a little. If you are a tall person driving a Yaris this might not work for you. I am 5'4 and I feel like I am sitting close to the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This a good car seat for the price. It is perfect for a grandparent or for the second car. It is also good for air travel because it is relatively light weight. I do have a little trouble adjusting the straps and the belt release is not the easiest. If I were the primary parent and using a car seat everyday, I would go for a sturdier model.
customer_reviews.author: Witchystitcher

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: I've had this carseat for about a year. I like it fine except the latch to attach it to the seat is very difficult. Very hard to loosen and tighten and sometimes I have to move it from car to car. About ready to get rid of it all together and get a different carseat
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to take in and out of car
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year ago. Works well enough as a car seat and cleans easy but very very difficult to take out of the car. We don't remove it super often, but when it needs to cleaned, to travel, to allow more adults in the car when needed the the strap on the bottom that has the took hooks on it is EXTREMELY difficult to loosen. While you would not want it to loosen too easily, it is a struggle every time we try to take the car seat out. With so many options out there, this glitch is a deal breaker. I regret purchasing the seat.
customer_reviews.author: John Murret

customer_reviews.title: Buy this seat.
customer_reviews.text: Best carseat ever! I feel that expensive car seats are a rip off. This one is safe, it's quality, it's comfortable for my baby, and it's easy to install and use. I can't believe a seat like this is available at this price. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Straps don’t tighten enough
customer_reviews.text: If I could return this car seat I would. It isn’t too hard to install but isn’t very sturdy once installed. It is also very hard to get the straps as tight as they should be around the child. I have found on too many occasions the straps falling off my child’s shoulders because I can’t get them tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandparents
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat for grandparents, pretty easy to install, easy to lift child into seat and get them buckled. I haven’t adjusted the seat to fit other grandchildren yet but hopefully it will be easy to adjust depending on who is visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Gru

customer_reviews.title: Quality seat for a great price!! Safety and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is awesome for the price! It has a great head adjustable head support and plenty of padding. It came assembled and looks like a much more expensive seat. It was easy to adjust to fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Child approved!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install! I am a nanny and use this for multiple children. It is super easy to change from rear facing to front facing. Other people were having a lot of problems with the latch but I found it very easy to use. My only complaint is that it’s very easy not to install properly. You really have to make sure the seatbelt is pulled tight enough and locked. The kids say it’s the most comfortable car seat they have ever been in!
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight car seat!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as our travel car seat since it’s lighter than our Extend2Fit weighing a little over 15lbs. It’s been a great car seat, durable, and comfortable! It is a bit heavier than the travel car seats most bloggers rec but I’ve bought those brands and I didn’t feel nearly as happy with them. This is much more comfortable for our LO on long car rides and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: wildcatsarahj

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to install without an inch of movement at the belt path. I despise this seat with every fiber of my being. Waste of money and a constant headache. Get a seat with a Clicktight install feature and avoid the misery this seat brings.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, but kind of big.
customer_reviews.text: The padding is super plush and I have no doubt my daughter is comfortable. It is a pretty big seat though... We have an Escape and initially wanted it in the middle of the backseat, but that wouldn't have allowed much room on either side of her for other people so we put it on the side, where it was also much more stable.
customer_reviews.author: gk

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This seat feels firm, yet the padding feels soft. It's basically a plastic mold shaped just like you need it to be, and passes a variety of regulations for impacts. It was easy to install, and very affordable. Overall I think it's a great product, that will last you at least the time you need it for your child.
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Simplest and Best Car Seat!
customer_reviews.text: We are grandparents, and car seats are confusing to us these days. My wife, old "granny" researched this one, and it is indeed the best, simplest car seat available! Inexpensive, too. No more car seat switching from my daughter's car... Hallelujah!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Our first carseat
customer_reviews.text: This was our first and so far only car seat. Of doing a ton of research we decided on this one. It's cheaper on Amazon then Target. Seems comfortable for our daughter.. Only draw back is the dang straps get twisted at times and are hard to un twist. But otherwise easy to install and easy to transfer between cars.
customer_reviews.author: Iowamom83

customer_reviews.title: In pre-owned condition and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Product i received wasn’t new at all.. looked preowened. Dirty and all. I took these pictures as I was installing it. I received it in the wrong box, Advertising a different car seat which to me meant that it was pre-owned and they stuffed it in this box to ship it. I am truly disappointed because I was expecting a brand new item other than that, this car seat is great, well a new one at least.
customer_reviews.author: Primarilyme

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and I love the adjustable headrest. Easy release for the belt, we are still using it rear-facing. We liked it so much we have three -two for the parents' cars, and one for grandma's car! I like that it will grow with her for a while, so no need to keep buying more car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: A bit bulky but safe !
customer_reviews.text: Got good ratings for safety and had bought one before but was in car accident with old one, No injuries to child so I had to buy the same seat being that accident was bad but child was unharmed in fact stayed sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Mushgirl

customer_reviews.title: This convertible car seat has been fine, but we find it difficult to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: This convertible car seat has been fine, but we find it difficult to get it tightened completely when we have to switch cars. I just wish there was a way for it to be more secure in the seat, there is a little sliding. We will probably switch to a different car seat that tightens better, for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Very nice car seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is very nice and comfortable. We have several car seats. One for each vehicle we drive. This car seat is the seat we use when traveling long distances. My daughter sits in it very well and seems a lot more comfortable than the others. Not to mention she has her own cup holder with this one also.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: we have a maxicosi pria 70 convertable car seat and although i love it to pieces i didnt want to spend the ...
customer_reviews.text: was really surprised by its light weight, ease of installation, ease of use and comfort of my child. we have a maxicosi pria 70 convertable car seat and although i love it to pieces i didnt want to spend the $299 to get a second one as a back up for emergencies. SO we searched around and the reveiws seemed to be really nice. We actually took the other car with this seat out to dinner the other night and our son was in 7th heaven. He actually seemed to like it just as much. When i peeked back at him, it was like he was kickin' back relaxing on our drive. Definitely would recommend this to others!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Whitney

customer_reviews.title: At first I didn't like the no recline in front position but after the ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't like the no recline in front position but after the super flexible adjustments you can make with any kid entering the car seat- I will never ever use anything but this seat! I LOVE it. So much so that I donated the one in my other car and bought a second!!! It's awesome and washes super easy so yea!!!!! It actually looks clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Z.

customer_reviews.title: This seat was fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This seat was fairly easy to install. I really like how the belts are longer so you can push them out of the way while sitting the little one in the seat. However, this also poses a small problem because the longer tether makes it harder to tighten the straps. We have this in a Subaru and because of the long tether, I have to stand up with my head outside the car and pull to tighten. It's quite difficult otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: A bit hard to install
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult to attach to the car and to tighten sufficiently. If I never had to remove the car seat, that might be fine, but I am the Grandma, so I sometimes need that space for passengers. It is hard to remove and hard to reinstall. But it works fine once you do that.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rear Facing Seat
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Graco car seat line. This chair was perfect when my son needed to be rear facing but no longer fit in the infant seat. Once it was time to face forward, this seat was way to bulky. The fabric is really easy to clean and my son seemed very cozy in this.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This seat is by far much more comfortable for our baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Graco Contender for one car, and a Britax Marathon for our other car. This seat is by far much more comfortable for our baby, and much easier to get her in and out of. And considering the Britax was over $100 more, I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a convertible car seat. We love love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Drew

customer_reviews.title: It installs really easy with the latch system
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my 9 month old son. It's his big boy seat :) no more baby carrier type car seat! Yay! It installs really easy with the latch system. You can also use the vehicles seatbelt if you can't do the latch. It faces rear or forward. Seems super comfy. Has simple height adjustments. And it has a cup holder. I put it in a Chevy Cruze. We gained a little bit of our leg room back upfront. I was excited about that! I'd buy this car seat again!!
customer_reviews.author: Snow*Cupcakes*

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these seats for my twin granddaughters. The seats are comfortable, easy to adjust, and easy to fasten in the car using the car's seat belt. I took the seat coverings off to wash them and, while it took a bit of time to get the coverings off, they washed up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: misly

customer_reviews.title: Seat would be five stars but its practically impossible to actually get it out of your car
customer_reviews.text: This seat would have 5 stars if it weren’t impossible to remove. The buckle that tightens and releases the belt that attaches the clips to the vehicle does not work. Like at all. It’s a fight every single time you want to get it out of your car. I have two of these seats and it’s a problem for both. It’s a shame cause the seat is great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: dpnation

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tighten belt
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was fairly easy to install and fits well in my 09 Accord, even with the front seat all the way back. I do not like the difficulty of tightening the shoulder straps and waist belt; it seems I can never get them tight enough-quite frustrating. Without the shoulder protectors, the straps do dig in to the child's shoulders and cause redness; I wish they would include the shoulder strap covers. It does seem quite comfy and I like the ease of being able to move the straps up and down without re-threading.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Super annoying button to loosen straps
customer_reviews.text: The button you have to press to loosen the straps (not the button to unlatch the clips) is in a bizarre location, really difficult to get your finger into it especially when it's rear facing. I have a Chicco carseat as well that uses a button for this feature, and it's so much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like this seat enough that we have bought 3 of them for our 2 kids in our vehicles. I have had the first one for 1 1/2 years now. It is easy to put in, comfortable, easy to adjust. The only cons I have about the carseat is that you can only spot clean, the fabric does not come off to be laundered. Also I find that the adjustable strap between the legs that you pull to tighten does not tighten enough when the child is buckled fully. I wish I was able to tighten the buckles easier.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Got a very good rating. They were comfortable and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these when my 3 year old grandsons cam for a visit. My daughter really check them out before they were bought. Got a very good rating. They were comfortable and easy to install. Actually went to the police station and had an expert do a free install for safety.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Practically unusable rear-facing
customer_reviews.text: I had an old model of this car seat for my older son and loved it, so when my youngest out grew his infant car seat I purchased this one. I was extremely disappointed and frustrated when I realized that the lever that loosens the harness has been changed and is nearly impossible to use when the car seat is rear facing. When used forward facing the lever is usable, although not as conveniently placed as the older model. Unfortunately I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not like that the straps pull in and out from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose well. Safely holds my daughter and fits well in my car. I do not like that the straps pull in and out from the shoulders. Its rubs her neck and gives her red marks often. I wish I would have known to look for that. our other car seat pulls from the bottom and she has no marks from its use.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Solid seat good for husbands suv that doesn’t get used a whole lot . Super hard to tighten the strap in the latch system while rear facing . Seems I couldn’t pull it tight enough to keep the seat from wiggling even though there was some slack I couldn’t get it to tighten anymore .
customer_reviews.author: lindsay bohney

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this car seat for a few months now and have loved it. It spacious and fits in our tiny car. The only thing I don’t love is that when it’s rear facing it’s hard to loosen the straps because of the angle (but that could be because of our tiny car). Other than that it’s been a great car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Holdaway

customer_reviews.title: Fits Prius C
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my Prius c. It fits without me moving the seat up. I am only 5’3. The seat has good quality. The latches are hard to undo to move the seat, but I don’t plan on moving it so it’s ok. This was a great seat for my granddaughter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install in the car and easy to tighten and loosen. Love the safety specs and that my son is safe in it! Also doesn’t take up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: Goretti

customer_reviews.title: Very safe and easy to install and manipulate
customer_reviews.text: Very safe and easy to install and manipulate. The opening for the strap between the legs is extremely awkward to get to when the seat is in a rear-facing configuration, so much so that I had to cut the protective flap off in order to be able to reach in to press the lever that loosens the seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Good carseat
customer_reviews.text: I love this carseat, sometimes even better than the Graco 4ever! It is comfortable rear facing and the fabric is nice and soft. Easy to install. The only downfall is only one cup holder and she likes 2, one for snack and one for cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This new one is good looking, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: For my grandbaby. His mama told me exactly which one to purchase. He had outgrown his first car seat. This new one is good looking, sturdy, and I feel it is quite safe for its precious cargo. Car seats have sure changed since my babies were babies in the early 80's!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Cow

customer_reviews.title: Best carseat
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great car seat for the cost. My kids find it comfortable and it doesn’t take up a huge amount of room in my sedan.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Martin

customer_reviews.title: I love this carseat
customer_reviews.text: It is so perfect and was a great deal. I'm super happy about the quality for the price I got it. I'm sad my baby girl is graduating to a big girl car seat, but I feel much more comfortable now that I've seen how safe and high quality this seat is. I was able to get two of them! One for each car. Highly recommend. They are also very easy to adjust for height, because she is growing SO quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BaleD

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: No problems so far. Loving it! Ordered it for our now 1 year old and when he was about 8 months. Works great rear facing
customer_reviews.author: cassandra Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty big! Bigger than most car seats! Def cant fit 3 in a row. But very sturdy and comfortable for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Xeng V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a three year old!
customer_reviews.text: We have an expensive top of the line car seat as well- amd this is our favorite. We bought a second one for the grand parent's car as well. Straps are easy to use and love the cup holder! Kept our daughter rear facing in it until 40 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Meems

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Super easy to install thankfully. All car seats require the same testing and regulations and the safety of my child is #1 but I didn't want to spend $200+ on a car seat. This one is perfect and I won't feel like it's cheaply made at all.
customer_reviews.author: Oberholz

customer_reviews.title: Backup Car seat yes.. Every day NO
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable for my daughter but even after adjusting it several times the seat moves quit a bit and makes me a bit nervous of its quality. Luckily this is in our second car that is only used for short distance around town about once a week. I would not buy this car seat if this is your every day car seat. A backup car seat or grandma car seat sure!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fits better than any other car seat in my 2012 Toyota ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits better than any other car seat in my 2012 Toyota Corolla. My son enjoys how high it puts him so he can look out the window. It is very comfortable with soft fabric and cushioning as well. My only regret is we bought a different car seat for the second vehicle and not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Installation can't be tightened
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that it is a very good car seat...IF...we could ever have gotten it installed correctly. We tried multiple times (2018 Honda CRV) and could never get it to the point where we were comfortable. We considered taking it to our local police/fire station for help but we are grandparents so it is not used every day and we will take it in and out of the car often. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install, feels safe
customer_reviews.text: Moved my child to this from an infant car seat and we both enjoy how well she fits in it and will be able to grow for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Graco rules.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for my toddler. It is easy to use and install and has decent safety features. I would like a little more head cushion for the sides of her head and possibly some padding for around the belt buckle piece. All in all a decent product worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: We have the britax click tight in my car and I really like these graco ones
customer_reviews.text: So I got two of these for my husbands truck for our twins. We have the britax click tight in my car and I really like these graco ones. Adjustable and very easy to adjust height of straps without too much hassle which is perfect for growing boys. Is buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: A.W. Jones

product_meta.title: Graco Contender 65 Convertible Car Seat, Glacier
product_meta.description:
The Graco Contender 65 Convertible Car Seat grows with your child from 5-40 lb (rear-facing) and 20-65 lb (forward-facing). It easily adapts to your growing child using the Simply Safe Adjust Harness System, which automatically adjusts both the harness and headrest height in one motion. The included LATCH and easy-to-read level indicator offer you hassle-free installation. This convertible car seat features a removable body support, machine-washable seat pad, and two buckle positions to help keep your child snug and secure. This seat is Graco ProtectPlus Engineered, which helps to protect your little one in frontal, side, rear, and rollover crashes. Buckle may be cleaned with a damp cloth

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Designed to help protect your rear facing child from 5-40 pounds and your forward facing child from 20-65 pounds
Simply Safe Adjust Harness System adjusts the harness and headrest height together with one easy motion, no re threading required

Graco ProtectPlus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that helps to protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes; additional testing based on the New Car Assessment Program and for extreme car interior temperatures
8-position headrest is adjustable using one hand and easily adapts to your growing child's needs
Hassle free installation in the rear-facing position using LATCH and an easy to read level indicator

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,369 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
